RTCPeerConnectionAddTrack.summary: The method addTrack() adds a new media track to the set of tracks which will be transmitted to the other peer.

blockquote.para:
Note: Adding a track to a connection triggers renegotiation by firing a event.
See Starting negotiation for details.

RTCPeerConnectionAddTrack.returns:
The object which will be used to transmit the media data.
NOTENote: Every RTCRtpSender is paired with an
to make up an . The
associated receiver is muted (indicating that it is not able to deliver packets) until
and unless one or more streams are added to the receiver by the remote peer.
